changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE CUSTOMERS( CUSTOMERID varchar2(10) NOT NULL, NICKNAME varchar2(100) NOT NULL, FIRSTNAME varchar2(100) NOT NULL, LASTNAME varchar2(100) NOT NULL, BIRTHDATE DATE, EMAIL varchar2(100 char), COUNTRYCODE varchar2(100 char), CITY varchar2(100 char), REGDATE TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, CREDENTIALID varchar2(10) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT PK_CUSTOMERS PRIMARY KEY (CUSTOMERID) );

CREATE TABLE CREDENTIALS( CREDENTIALID varchar2(10) NOT NULL, PASSWORD varchar2(100) NOT NULL, SALT varchar2(100) NOT NULL, ENCODETYPE varchar2(100) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT PK_CREDENTIALS PRIMARY KEY (CREDENTIALID) );
